text: The 2015 ICC Europe Under-19 Championship was an international cricket tournament held in Jersey, from 11 to 18 July 2015. The winner of the tournament, Scotland, qualified directly for the 2016 Under-19 World Cup, while the runner-up, Ireland, will play the other runners-up from regional qualifying tournaments at the 2015 World Cup Qualifier, with the winner of that tournament also qualifying for the World Cup.(7 July 2015). "ICC U19 Cricket World Cup spot up for grabs in Jersey" – ICC Europe.
